data.name: Top of Alps office - Nancy's Nursery
LZ Rope Tow Tower-Both Terrain Park Sides

children.text: Paul's Pub is a full service restaurant offering brunch, burgers and bloody mary's.
Landing Zone is a bar and snack stop featuring pretzels, corn dogs and donuts.
Highlands Cafe is a quick service restaurant offering tacos and pizza. Featured items include a rotating chef's special pizza.
Paul's T-Bar is a full-service bar, located inside the Alps chalet, serving draft beer and cocktails daily.
Meadows Chalet is quick service restuarant offering Grilled Cheese, Chicken Tenders and Chicken sandwhiches.
Our main chalet with a wide variety of ski hill favorites, including burgers, fries and chicken tenders.
The Crest is a full-service bar, located inside the Highlands chalet.
